mapper.insert: insert into setmeal (name, category_id, price, image, description, status, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) values (#{name}, #{categoryId}, #{price}, #{image}, #{description}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser})
mapper.delete: delete from setmeal where id in (#{ids})
mapper.select: select * from setmeal where id in (#{ids})
